attributes.action: Erect a Sculpture of Richard Kylea 'Wiley' Cowie in Bow, E3 London
attributes.background:
In 2013 More than 2,000 people joined a campaign to erect a public statue of Wiley, widely considered the Godfather of Grime music, in London. The petition was rejected.
5 years on, and Wiley’s influence has grown ever more significant and his status in urban culture has been written into history

rejection.details:
This seems to be a decision for the local council to make, rather than the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
